review: The device itself is friendly with an easy to navigate interface. What is disappointing is the amount of Apps available for Fire TV.  If Amazon and the major TV networks can't reach an agreement to include their Apps, I don't believe this technology will last long.
author: Michael

review: The Fire Stick has performed as advertised. I am enjoying Prime programming on my TV as well as my Kindle.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Was very easy to setup and connect.  The only difficulty was getting it from behind some wires so that it could get a clear signal.  Since then works well. Wish we had a few more movies to pick from.
author: The Bear "Tommy L Waldrop"

review: Getting into each app was more difficult using the on-screen log in then setting up the Fire Stick. Save yourself frustration and log-in with your computer.
author: potterygirl

review: Was not aware to have a powered USB adapter plugged into it. Kind of takes the portability out of it.
author: Tony Salmon

review: Great value! It adds so much to our entertainment selection.  We have binged watch a huge variety of shows and makes Prime a much better value.  My only negative is that it sometimes loses Wifi connections and takes awhile to reload.
author: Amber Bren

review: has some issues on 5GHz, but overall, I love it. Should have bought two.
author: hyperwookiee

review: Best stick with the most features that I have found. Ease of use and functionality is that of apple quality, with the added benefits of your prime accounts.
author: Eric Neusiis

review: Very easy to install.  I have amazon prime and it is loaded with all the amazon prime benefits of movie and music selection, even is synced with music that I recently downloaded.  My only disappointment is that hulu and other apps like that such as netflicks are a little trickier to find and use.  Well worth purchasing and plugging into your tv to watch amazon prime movies, much easier than connecting laptop to tv with monster cable to watch movies on large screen tv...would recommend
author: JMH
